name: Sanji & Pudding
text:
[Your Turn] [Once Per Turn] When 2 or more of your DON!! cards are returned to your DON!! deck, set up to one DON!! card from your DON!! deck as active.
[On Play] If your number of DON!! cards are equal to or less than your opponent's, draw 1 card.

effect.text: When 2 or more of your DON!! cards are returned to your DON!! deck, set up to one DON!! card from your DON!! deck as active.
If your number of DON!! cards are equal to or less than your opponent's, draw 1 card.
